about_the_game:
"A curious and a little painful adventure story about leaving to find a lost body."

Pammy (main character) opens her eyes one day in a strange place. In a strange space with a strange structure that she has never seen before, and a handful of colors,
For some reason, even if I try to move my body, all body parts except the head have disappeared.
Confused for a moment, I can feel a familiar energy in the distance. Let's roll right now and get going.
Will Pammy be able to regain her body beyond countless crises and bizarre obstacles in a space where there is no end in sight?

The space that leads to one consists of several sections that can properly utilize and avoid various terrain, footholds, and obstacles.
Use all your skills, strategies, memory, and luck to get to your destination safely after a difficult journey.
In the process of attacking the strange space, boil up your desire for challenge and feel the ultimate sense of accomplishment through the ever-changing appearance of Pammy and various records.



A simple but messy, fun manipulation that incorporates the laws of physics!

I think anyone can challenge and easily get through with a simple drawing style and bright music!
It induces detailed manipulation with movements that reflect braking distance, acceleration, gravity, and sense of balance.

Pammy's movement can be moved by left and right direction keys, and there are normal and acceleration states
There will be completely different results depending on the distance required for acceleration, the falling height, and the jumping position.



The increasingly difficult obstacle structure, the complicated terrain, and the pain you create with your hands!

It will come as a bigger difficulty as the mistakes and curiosity that inevitably arise as you explore and learn strange spaces come together.
As soon as you make the wrong choice, the difficulty will become more and more difficult, and clumsy challenges will also make it difficult.

You can strategically crash to make up for mistakes in this process, or you can bump yourself into it.
You can try again and again, and try your luck, until your memory takes hold.
You can also experience a device that can embarrass you and something that makes you feel secure.

Amid countless challenges, you will feel various difficulties and despair, but don't give up!
In the challenge, you will learn the ropes, you will be lucky, and you will move forward little by little!

Escape the strange space safely, as seen through your persistence and all your experiences! Find You!

name: FindMe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: This is a 2D flatformer game where you go on an adventure to regain your body, and you arrive at your destination through various sections. Lots of prepared obstacles, traps, and tricks. I hope you reach your destination with all your detailed manipulation, memory, persistence, and luck.
